name: find-my-iphone-alexa
description: The goal of this skill is to be able to find your phone with ease. If you can't find your device, simply say `"Alexa, ask locator to find my phone"`. ## Setup To begin setting up this skill, you must create an Amazon Developer account. Click [here](https://developer.amazon.com/edw/home.html) to access the Amazon Developer Console and begin the skill creation. Select "Get Started" under "Alexa Skills Kit" and follow the instructions to setup your skill.
